sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Wrapper class="account-manage" :paddingTop="paddingTop">
   <AppHeader title="账号管理" ref="header" ></AppHeader>
    <List>
      <ListItem label="修改密码" arrow="true" link="/setting/accountManage/1">
      </ListItem>
    </List>
    <List>
      <ListItem label="更改手机号" arrow="true" link="/setting/accountManage/2">
      </ListItem>
    </List>
  </Wrapper>
</template>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
.account-manage {
  height: 100vh;
  background: #f6f6f6;
  overflow: hidden;
}
</style>
<script>
import List from '../../../components/List'
import ListItem from '../../../components/ListItem'
import Wrapper from '../../../components/Wrapper'
import { mapState } from 'vuex'
import AppHeader from '../../../components/AppHeader'

export default {
  components: {
    List,
    ListItem,
    Wrapper,
    AppHeader
  },
    computed: {
    ...mapState({
      platform: state => state.system.platform,
    }),
    paddingTop: function() {
      return this.platform === 'wechat' ? '0px' : '90px'
    }
  },
}
</script>
